text: Has anyone created a search feature using the HubSpot API or some other piece of technology OTHER than the google site search?
I think I saw someone who used a Javascript search solution before, ill see if I can find it. Seemed like it would be more work in the end though.
anyone having an problems in the editor loading external CSS files over HTTP -- and them not showing up in the editor?
It is rejecting a bunch of http calls because there is no ssl
so the styling inside the editor isn't showing up

Hey guys! For anybody interested in progressive image loading on the COS check out this post on our new Design Forum: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Share-Your-Work/Progressive-Image-Loading-with-HubSpot/m-p/324> :slightly_smiling_face:
also note that jpegs uploaded to File Manager automatically get converted to progressive jpegs
is that true for png files?
